headline: Is RTX’s AWS-Powered Cloud Mission Control Push Altering The Investment Case For RTX (RTX)?
summary: In early December 2025, Raytheon, an RTX business, announced a collaboration with Amazon Web Services to modernize satellite data processing and mission control using cloud infrastructure, AI, and machine learning, including edge-deployed AWS Outposts and serverless architectures. This tie-up could be meaningful for RTX’s space and defense franchises by embedding advanced cloud and AI tools directly into mission workflows, potentially enhancing operational efficiency and appeal to national...
